name: IPMI 2.0 RAKP Remote SHA1 Password Hash Retrieval
author: Dan Farmer <zen@fish2.com>
hdm <x@hdm.io>
description:
This module identifies IPMI 2.0-compatible systems and attempts to retrieve the
        HMAC-SHA1 password hashes of default usernames. The hashes can be stored in a
        file using the OUTPUT_FILE option and then cracked using hmac_sha1_crack.rb
        in the tools subdirectory as well hashcat (cpu) 0.46 or newer using type 7300.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: USER_FILE
options.description: File containing usernames, one per line

options.name: PASS_FILE
options.description: File containing common passwords for offline cracking, one per line

options.name: OUTPUT_HASHCAT_FILE
options.description: Save captured password hashes in hashcat format

options.name: OUTPUT_JOHN_FILE
options.description: Save captured password hashes in john the ripper format

options.name: CRACK_COMMON
options.description: Automatically crack common passwords as they are obtained
